item.title: Aug 26, 2006
item.description: For those who are wondering how to survive in french, we are providing you a useful guide with a translation French - English of the basic sentences you could need to ask for food, directions and so on: Download the french survival guide now.

item.title: Jun 15, 2006
item.description: Opening of the registration for attending to the OpenOffice.org conferences 2006. Register now.

item.title: Jun 4, 2006
item.description: Thanks to our partner, Air France, you can get savings for your travel to OpenOffice.org Conferences 2006. For more informations report to the travel page.

item.title: Jun 2, 2006
item.description: Due to a problem on the mail server outage the 31th of May, the Call for Paper closing date has been delayed until Monday 5th June 2006.

item.title: Mar 17, 2006
item.description: Call for papers issued - note: closing date Jun 1
